message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I'm looking to spend closer to $100. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to spend closer to $100, but I'm still willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
